description.fr: Former les onigiri avec du kimchi haché au centre et saupoudrer de graines de sésame pour une saveur coréenne authentique.
description.en: Shape onigiri with chopped kimchi in the center and sprinkle with sesame seeds for authentic Korean flavor.
description.ko: 잘게 썬 김치를 중앙에 넣고 참깨를 뿌려 진정한 한국 맛의 오니기리를 만드세요.

tips.fr:
Ajouter le kimchi au centre avant de former
Saupoudrer de graines de sésame
Former des triangles avec les mains humides
tips.en:
Add kimchi to center before shaping
Sprinkle with sesame seeds
Shape triangles with wet hands
tips.ko:
만들기 전에 중앙에 김치를 넣으세요
참깨를 뿌리세요
젖은 손으로 삼각형을 만드세요
